title: Green Garden Organic
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, Organic, Thai, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Sustainable vegan restaurant serving organic Malaysian, Chinese, Thai and Western cuisine. Menus inspired by seasonal Malaysian fruits and vegetables, using local as much as possible. No MSG, garlic, onion, chives, spring onion/scallions or leeks.
streetAddress: Jalan 3/62a , Unit 1, First Floor, Bandar Menjalara
